slide.text: + Types of HDLs (e.g., HDL-A, HDL-B, etc.)
+ Characteristics of HDLs (e.g., unique, persistent, etc.)

+ HDLs as a Key Technology for Digital Identification
+ Opportunities and Challenges for HDLs in the Future
